quote: There was no sun; there was no light. I was dying. I couldn't remember what the sky looked like. But I didn't die. I was lost to a sea of cold, and then I was reborn into a world of warmth.
quote_letters: THERE WAS NO SUN THERE WAS NO LIGHT I WAS DYING I COULDNT REMEMBER WHAT THE SKY LOOKED LIKE BUT I DIDNT DIE I WAS LOST TO A SEA OF COLD AND THEN I WAS REBORN INTO A WORLD OF WARMTH
